Square Enix Creative Business Unit III

name: Wizard with a Gun: Bounty Edition
description: Wizard with a Gun: Bounty Edition bundles the base game with the Gunmancer Pack and Bounty Hunter Pack.

name: Dollhouse: Behind the Broken Mirror
description:
Enter the broken mind of Eliza de Moor, a once-celebrated singer, now trapped in the labyrinth of her own forgotten memories. The only hope for recovering her memories lies with Doctor Stern and his experimental medicine. As Eliza, you'll navigate the reality and the world behind the broken mirror, guided by the effects of the drug.

Will you be able to piece together the mystery of your past, or will you get lost in this dark and twisted reality?

name: South Park: Snow Day! - Season Pass
description: Continue your Snow Day adventure with a Season Pass for SOUTH PARK: SNOW DAY! which includes and all-new Game Mode, New Weapons, a Weapon Variation, and Cosmetic Packs.

name: South Park: Snow Day! - Cred Pack
description: A kid today is defined by their hydration drink – and their swag. Impress your friends and show the world how much CRED you have. The CRED Cosmetics pack gives you plenty of cred with a fresh hairstyle, a CRED hoodie, and a cape.

name: Micro Doctor
description:
In Micro Doctor, you play as a tiny doctor who delves into the human body to save lives! The adventure takes place entirely inside the human body, allowing you to explore and learn about the different systems in an exciting and unique way. Your mission is to eliminate germs, bacteria, and viruses that are wreaking havoc on the body. You must take medicine and use your expertise to save the day. This exciting game is based on the real systems of the human body, making it a fun and educational experience for all ages.

As you journey through the human body, you will encounter different systems, including the digestive, respiratory, circulatory, and urinary systems. Each system presents new challenges that will test your skills and knowledge. This game is the ultimate didactic tool, making it a perfect way to teach young children about the human body in an engaging and interactive way.

Micro Doctor is compatible with all Game Boy, Game Boy Color, and Game Boy Advance handhelds, making it accessible to everyone. So what are you waiting for? Join the Micro Doctor on this incredible adventure and become a hero of the human body!

name: South Park: Snow Day! - Underpants Gnome Cosmetics Pack
description: Elevate your style with The Underwear Gnome Cosmetics Pack! Unleash your fashion creativity with a trendy Underwear Gnome hat, a stylish beard, a vibrant and a green tunic.

name: South Park: Snow Day! - To Danse with Ravenous Shadows
description: School is cancelled and Henrietta is bored. Join her efforts to pierce the veil and she will allow you to “Danse with the Ravenous Shadows” of South Park.

name: South Park: Snow Day! - Digital Deluxe
description: Sin descripción

name: UltraCook
description: Test your cooking & multitasking skills in this arcade Chef Sim!

name: Commando Hero 2: First Blood
description: Hero who wants to be a commando has to pass difficult tracks. Finish the track fast and enter the Leaderboard.

name: Texas Border Guard
description: This is a first-person shooter game, the late 21st century, the world is overcrowded, the world is full of hunger and viruses. Small countries have long been crowded in by refugees from all over the world. However, aliens also appeared in this world. Because the whole world is paralyzed.

name: Nine Lives Ninja: Explore!
description: Take control of a cat (who also happens to be a ninja) in this platformer with metroidvania elements! Explore the ancient cave system and find new powers to help you overcome obstacles in your search for the Fountain of Kitty Youth.

name: Blood Poker
description: The Rules are Simple. Bet with your Blood. Enjoy the Show.

name: Dragonpaw
description: Join the lazy, disgraced, idiot-moron wizard Ronan alongside his brave, powerful, attractive bodyguards Cinder and Socks on a 2.5D dungeon-crawling journey to defeat the gromnipotent Wizard Grup.

name: Save Giant Girl from Monsters
description: A flight simulator game. Save the giant girl from the monsters attacking her using a helicopter or plane.

name: Fleshless
description: Fleshless is unique fixed camera exploration game with rich lore, where you need to explore abstract world and discover it's secrets.

name: Permanent: Hope & Vacuum
description: Psychological horror, puzzles, platforming, adventure, dungeons, action, intrigue and a touching story are all terms that should be used to try to define the essence of «Permanent: Hope & Vacuum».

name: Oversleep
description: Oversleep is a first-person puzzle adventure. Navigate dreamworlds, solve intricate puzzles, and employ unique mechanics to reveal secrets and overcome obstacles. Experience a mind-bending journey through bizarre environments.

name: PrismaVenture Clash
description: Thrilling, high-octane action experience where strategic dodging meets explosive challenges. Maneuver through meticulously crafted patterns of explosions to rack up points and unlock new levels. How long can you endure the chaos in this adrenaline-fueled arena survival game?

name: DinoEscape in the Time!
description: A portal opened and launched the dinosaur into the modern world, now it's up to this dinosaur to turn on 5 generators and turn on the time machine to go back to the past.

name: Sex Maids
description: Sex Maids - is an erotic game in the genre of "Arkanoid", in which you will have to break the cubes and gradually discover really beautiful and hot images.

name: The Colonists: New Lands
description: Expand your frontiers with The Colonists: New Lands! Improve your transport network with Bridges and Train Tunnels, boost your economy with the Mint and even allow your bots to discover their spiritual side…

name: I am an Air Traffic Controller 4: Airport Nagoya - RJGG
description:
This product (ATC4: Airport NAGOYA [RJGG]) is DLC for "I am an Air Traffic Controller 4".
This DLC includes control of the Chubu Centrair International Airport in Tokoname, Aichi, Japan.

name: Clue For Your Thoughts
description: Sift through the evidence to find out who did it.

name: Evil Sinister
description: You're a journalist investigating an abandoned house. Armed with only a flashlight, navigate its haunted halls to uncover its secrets. Beware, malevolent forces lurk, blurring reality and nightmare. Will you survive to reveal the truth, or become another victim of its sinister grasp?

name: Dog: The Dog Takes the Hindmost
description: Looks like Ludo, but it's DOG. In this game, you also have to safely bring your four game pieces into your home area. The difference is that they are moved using cards that have a few surprises in store for you. Team spirit is important, because you can only win together.

name: Secret with Sophia: Lite Version
description: Let Sophia whisk your troubles away... Take it easy and enjoy some soothing relaxation time with your maid Sophia, who's fully animated via Live2D!

name: Escape the Traps
description: "Escape the Traps" is an addictive and challenging game that puts your skills and reflexes to the test.

name: Sister's Curriculum
description: The Story of Tutoring Top 1% Repeat Students Sisters

name: Search All: Candles
description: Is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the candles in a large location. Candles will be placed in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places

name: Back in Prehistory
description: Back in Prehistory is an exciting adventure game where you take on the role of a character who stumbles upon a time machine while exploring prehistoric times.

name: Fuck You Witch
description: Your best friend has confessed her love for you... but the problems don't stop there. You've started to hallucinate. All this interferes with sleeping and eating, and in general disrupts your ideal lifestyle. Yell obscenities at the witch, immerse yourself in the atmosphere of the Qazaq steppes

name: Grand Canyon
description: Survive on your own while trying to meet your basic needs such as food, water and shelter, interact with the survivors and fulfill the tasks they give you, plan to escape from the island.

name: Airanblade
description: AIRANBLADE is a 3D vertical progression action game, like the classic shoot 'em up games. Fight against squadrons of enemy aircrafts and gigantic bosses. Enjoy beautiful special effects and lots of explosions and lasers coming from every corner.

name: Moving Houses
description: A silly little physics-based game about moving on.

name: Hentai Casino
description: Your girlfriend is asking you for money, so you face a tough choice: Work hard to advance in your job, and perhaps your boss will reward you ;) OR Go to casino and trust your luck. Win money and unlock new girls!

name: I Got Gooned by a Femboy
description: Desperate times call for desperate measures.

name: Phantom Ascension
description: Dive into the intense "Phantom Ascension," a single-player action game set in a dystopian 20XX. With unchecked corporate power, crumbling governments, and rampant lawlessness, the Blacklight Gang, a coalition of criminals and mercenaries, seizes control, plunging the world into chaos.

name: Sea Of Minds
description: Sea of Minds is an immersive game in which you have to move through a crowd by slipping into the bodies of the people present. As you move from body to body, listen to their thoughts, listen to their problems and try to help them. They'll sure be grateful.

name: My Valentine is a Femboy
description: A day before Valentine's Day a special someone just happens to fall into your lap.

name: Evolution Board Game: Flight Expansion
description: Evolution: Flight, an expansion for Evolution, introduces flying species into the ecosystem. Now your species can swoop on unsuspecting prey from above, fly away from predators, or soar to a new food source when food is scarce.

name: Cosmic Holes Junior
description: "COSMIC HOLES JUNIOR" is a logical puzzle game for adults and children aged 7 and over. The aim of the game is to fill holes with elements, following logical rules and keeping the balance of the elements!

name: Stellar Monarch 2: Old Dynasties
description: Old Dynasties is the first expansion to Stellar Monarch 2, a feudal space empire builder where you feel like the Emperor not a logistics officer. The expansion focuses on noble houses and internal politics of the Empire by introducing new mechanics and events.

name: Col:Verse
description: Adventure that transports you to captivating realms, where you'll battle monsters, and solve mind-bending puzzles, journey of a regular gamer who stumbles upon a secret project, only to find himself trapped within the game world. Defeat the game and escape, or will you be forever lost in its depths?

name: Slay To The End
description: "Slay To The End" is an intense and thrilling survival roguelite game that plunges you into the edge of the apocalypse. Faced with hordes of terrifying creatures, your only option is to wield your weapon and embark on a brutal journey of slaughter, battling until the very last moment.

name: Tales Of Aravorn: Reign Of War
description: In the second spin-off of the VN/RPG Loren The Amazon princess, play as Elenor or Saren again and embark on a quest to Zoltar, where a mysterious relic awaits you. It may be your only hope to stop the demons, who have launched a new attack under Zeal’s leadership.

name: ComicBachiCooon!!
description: "Comic Bachicon!!" is an action game in which a player who has become a popular manga artist completes a manuscript by hitting characters from the manga world into frames! ! Let's hit the characters everywhere, including the pieces and the ground! !

name: Touhou: Fading Illusion - Destitute Chapter
description: The "Destitute Chapter" presents the events of Touhou: Fading Illusion from the perspective of Reimu Hakurei. Join her as she searches for answers to a series of mysterious and tragic events that will forever change her view of the youkai and Gensokyo.

name: Quack Attack
description: Join the Cubic Chaos! Get ready for a wild ride in this 4v4 FPS arena on a cube planet. Choose your animal, collect ducks, and let limbs fly in this cartoon mayhem. With collectible weapons, multiplayer and voice chat, it's a fun carnage at its finest!

name: D-Day Invasions
description: 64 player PVP matches in VR

name: Mini Zen Garden
description: Create your own mini zen garden in this calming sandbox game. Decorate your beautiful garden with a minimalistic set of objects. Share your garden with others, sit back, and relieve your day's stress.

name: Netghost
description: Netghost is a Crime Drama visual novel with a mystery-driven story full of intrigue, twists and turns. The story follows Ian Newfield, a cyber security engineer who transforms into a cold-blooded criminal in his struggle to protect the company he works for and aid his ailing sister.

name: Secrets of the Shore
description: Discover the allure of 'Secrets of the Shore,' where a serene island getaway takes a mysterious turn with the arrival of a storm. Forge meaningful connections with captivating characters and explore the secrets that emerge amidst the changing tides in this charming yet intriguing visual novel.

name: Meet The Animals
description: A comedic twist on the average stylized exploration indie game, find your way around this beautiful farm and interact with the animals that have been scattered across the landscape.

name: Jury: Episode 1 - Before the Trial
description: A high quality, erotic, sexy and fun visual novel - and yes, there are animations!

name: Jury: Episode 2 - The Trial of Brooke Lafferty
description: The second instalment of Jury AVN: This Episode starts where you left off from Episode 1. The trial is about to start, so get your suit on, and get your ass to court!

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 12: A.B.A
description: This allows the character "A.B.A" to be used in-game.

name: Sprout Valley: Easter
description: Make your dream of settling on an island and growing a beautiful garden come true!

name: Elder's Will
description: A Father's Journey. A disabled father, fueled by love, scales treacherous lands with his honed crutches. Master the art of crutch combat, unleash devastating throws in battles, and navigate daring platforming to heal his ailing son. Can you defy despair in this minimalist, stylized 2D platformer?

name: Love and Demons
description: Dive into the fearsome demonic world! Step into the shoes of Max, a lazy prince who will be accompanied by three odd girls. Can you find a way to get him back home?

name: Room
description: I thought it was just an ordinary day, but I accidentally entered this endless cycle of rooms. Among the countless terrifying and anomalous things, there is a girl who seems like she shouldn't exist here.

name: 挂姬恶魔 - 怠惰之主：贝利尔
description: "Beelzebub" is a warrior-type character, delivering high damage while also having decent survivability. As the Lord of Sloth, she not only can push back enemy actions but also induces the "weakened" status upon foes. Radiating with feminine determination and unique charm, she exudes her own charisma

name: Backrooms: Eternal Shadows
description: Journey back into the abyss with "Backrooms: Eternal Shadows," an expansion that plunges you even deeper into the mysterious and twisted world of the Backrooms. As you step into the unknown, brace yourself for a haunting experience that transcends the boundaries of reality.

name: I Brought the Noble Girl Home
description: The future war broke out, and many noble girls were taken away by unknown creatures. You were chosen by your superiors to go on a secret mission to bring these girls back.

name: Beer Factory Crew
description: Beer Factory Crew puts you in shoes of a production facility manager. Your goal is to produce finished shipments of beer and sell them. You can manage inventories and work in progress, machine orders, worker assignements and research new items.

name: Peaches and Dreams
description: A turn-based rpg about overcoming emotional abuse and the monsters that find homes in your mind.

name: Circle = Circle
description: "CIRCLE = CIRCLE" is a simulation adventure game where you participate in a doujinshi sale event. Have fun selling books, drawing in your sketchbook, and talking with unique characters.

name: Baggage Inspector
description: Baggage inspection! The words every traveller dreads to hear! Only this time, you're not the traveller, you're the inspector. Sounds exciting? No? Ah, if only you knew the things people put in their baggage! Now you can, in this casual VR-supported work simulator.

name: Prince Adventures
description: Embark on an epic journey through the mystical realm of Magical Oasis in "Prince Adventures." Once a land of harmony and tranquility, it has now fallen under the grip of darkness as an evil demon has seized control, spreading chaos and destruction throughout this enchanted land.

name: Stronghold: Definitive Edition - Swine's Bay Campaign
description: 'Swine's Bay' extends the base Stronghold: Definitive Edition campaign with seven new missions and extra achievements. Under the tutelage of the wise Sergeant, continue your quest to rescue the fabled 'Jewel of the North' from the clutches of the villainous Pig.

name: Bodyrain
description: Slaughter hordes of zombies and challenging bosses in Bodyrain: a zombie FPS game! Accumulate money to acquire new weapons and gain experience to strengthen your character and clean up Dawn City!

name: Skeleton Messi
description: This is a game similar to Vampire Survivor. You are a skeleton named Messi with just a skull and a body, but you want to be the richest, the most powerful and the kindest in this world.

name: Dubio
description: Dubio is a game of tiny puzzle parcours. It offers a A challenging mix of puzzle-solving and momentum control. Jump and bounce through 100 levels that test your wits and sense of timing. Or are there more?

name: Deflectorium
description: Deflectorium: 2D sci-fi rogue-lite singleplayer. Deflect deadly shots back at your enemies to become unstoppable. With unique deflection system, you'll dominate battles while upgrading your skills and stats. Prepare for adrenaline experience where defense isn't just a tactic but an art.

name: God Please Help Me
description: Story-driven roguelike runner

name: ReRise
description: Futuristic Colosseum, W, A, S, D controlled robot wields deadly weapon to conquer by hunting creatures. Victories spawn challenges, testing limits, and intensifying crowd's roar. Steel Gladiator battles in arena, faces relentless creature horde. With each creature vanquished, Colosseum tension rises

name: Martial Law: Our Spring
description: Grey blocks of flat, Militia and tanks on the streets, the desire for a better tomorrow and your drunk buddy on the bench. Welcome to Martial Law: Our Spring.

name: Event Race: Bob's Art Table Tracks
description: Explore 'Colorful Tracks' with 3 vibrant raceways & 2 thrilling game modes: 'Last One Out' & 'Chased'. Outrace opponents or flee the deadly smoke!

name: Supreme Fighters: Javan Havan the Drunken Fist
description: A very cool drunken fist character using flames to his advantage!

name: Stacking Fairy
description: Let's stack various blocks to compete in height! It's a fun game where you can enjoy the excitement together with everyone or take pleasure in honing your skills diligently on your own!

name: Color Escape: The Love Levels
description: Discover new way to have communication problems with this love-themed level pack ♥

name: Robot Multitool
description: Robot Multitool is a puzzle adventure about a multifunctional robot. You can control a flying arm, cling to a rope, shoot, release an electric charge. You will have to go through fascinating puzzles, skill tasks and battles with robots.

name: Super Farming Boy
description: Your farm is under attack! Fly, harvest, grow crops & whack enemies with your shape-shifting one-button superpowers as you seek revenge from your evil nemesis, Korpo, who has captured your mom & friends! An action-puzzle farming sim featuring chain reactions and combos.

name: SysAdmin Odyssey: Back to the office
description: The SysAdmin simulator is a sandbox in which you can try on the role of a system administrator. Every new game day you will face different tasks and problems in the office where you work.

name: Riding to Bounce City: Babydoll Set A
description: Unique babydoll lingerie for CherryRuby, Eve, and Jeanne.

name: No Life
description: Farming simulation and zombie defense. You find yourself in a post-apocalyptic world where the undead roam freely, threatening to overrun everything in their path. Your mission: transform a desolate piece of land into a thriving farm while fending off hordes of relentless zombies.

name: KeepUp Survival: Mountain Map
description: A small additional Free Mountain Map. Explore this cute little map, go hunting and build a nice shelter.

name: Operation Temple
description: You have to take on the role of a mercenary going on a dangerous mission, you are sent to an abandoned city to restore magical totems and destroy enemy invaders.

name: Hermetica
description: Travel back to darker times, and enjoy a roguelike deckbuilder adventure, set in XVI Century. Discover the secrets of alchemy and fight mythical beasts. Hermetica combines card tactical combat and potion crafting, with a unique medieval art style.

name: Rally Champion Advanced
description: Sin descripción

name: Living with Temptation: American Sunset
description: The new edition of a classic Living with Temptation contains all expansions, with redesigned gameplay, refreshed visuals, and a lot of new content. Relationship simulator where you may try to stay faithful to your wife, exploring her wild fantasies or... go wild and date other girls behind her back.

name: Folgore
description: 1959 - Olimpia, South Italy. Play as Giove Scadenza and save your fiancée from the Inferna mafia with your newfound powers. Can you survive the Folgore ?

name: Kick Me!
description: Kick opponents off rooftops in KICK ME! Multiplayer PvP madness awaits as you strategize, deploy unique abilities, and grab boosts to secure victory. Navigate dynamic arenas, and be the best kicker! Are you up for the challenge?

name: Plasma Orb
description: Dive in the beautiful and mysterious world with your Plasmorb!

name: Magical Shop
description: Magical Shop is an add-on peripheral, which plugs permanently into the Casio Loopy, allowing players to take screen captures at any time and then print them. The device also came with its own in-built editing software, which becomes active when no cartridge is present in the slot. The software is capable of making modifications to prefabricated photos or saved screen captures. The art tools include image cropping, adding text, colors. Objects, and speech bubbles.

name: Super Knight World
description:
"Super Knight World" is a thrilling retro adventure that transports players to a captivating pixelated realm filled with delightful enemies, charming objects, and scenic landscapes. Armed with your trusty sword, you embark on a quest to vanquish nefarious foes, amass riches, and achieve the highest score possible.
Drawing inspiration from classic 8-bit console games, "Super Knight World" offers an enchanting blend of challenging yet straightforward gameplay, promising an experience rich in nostalgic charm. Traverse through meticulously crafted levels reminiscent of beloved jump-and-run classics, immersing yourself in a world brimming with old-school appeal.

name: Haunted Bloodlines
description: Haunted Bloodlines is a first person survival, psychological horror game. In the dark rooms of an expanding mansion, a terrifying story unfolds. As the mansion breathes, hidden secrets lay within its walls. Survival depends on your own sanity. Always remember time can either be a friend or an enemy.

name: SymbioPhobia
description: SymbioPhobiA is a short survival horror game, mainly from an isometric perspective that mixes action, exploration, puzzles and platforming that takes place in a futuristic and post-apocalyptic bunker that has an oppressive and claustrophobic atmosphere.

name: Iridio
description: Seized by criminals, the island designated for your research needs your help. Join Yatziri and the Wazhari tribe to liberate their hostages, explore hidden secrets, craft essential items and weapons, and strategically use fire and water in challenging puzzles and life-or-death battles for survival.

name: Mangoji
description: Mangoji — is not just a card game; it's an exhilarating dive into a world of excitement and beauty, where strategy and luck confront each other head-on. Prepare for a unique adventure, as over 150 enchanting ladies await to become part of your gaming experience.

name: Dark Web: Vigilante
description: You are Vigilantus, a master hacker fighting to fix a rotten society. Immerse yourself in a world ruled by corrupt corporations, politicians, and greedy pharmaceutical companies. Uncover dark political secrets, sabotage systems, redistribute wealth to the poor, and destroy entire corporations.

name: Forza Motorsport: 1966 Lotus Type 35
description: Forza Motorsport 1966 Lotus type 35

name: Sáivu
description:
You are a sáivu-sarrvát who has to find the dead reindeer's spirits and lead them to Sáivu before they get lost. To get there you have to avoid getting hurt by the beasts lurking around their territory, and defeat the dreadful monster Stállu.

This is a student game inspired by Sámi mythology and folklore, developed as a school project. We are a small team of three 3D generalists and a programmer. The game is made using Unreal Engine 4.

name: Dillo Guy
description: Dillo Guy is a Single-screen, 2D platforming game where the player needs to collect 50 gems inside 50 rooms, or else the World will end.

name: Average Maria Individual
description: Average Maria Individual is a parody of Super Mario Bros. created for Ruin Jam in 2015.

name: Sáivu
description:
Swipe currents to guide the letters to the green spring and see what words nature might speak. Take good care of the fish in the lake.

Skáimmadas the fish spirit narrates the way in three of the nine Sámi langugages: Northern Sámi, Skolt Sámi and Inari Sámi.

name: Livli: A Sámi Story
description: Follow Livli; a headstrong, smart Sámi girl whose village has been burnt down in late 1800's Sweden. As her people are persecuted or killed, she flees from the chaos. Embarking on a perilous journey in order to find the Bear - known as "Father Forest" he is a holy spirit and guardian deity, protecting the land and the Sámi people.

name: Coop Catacombs
description: A traditional roguelike with asynchronous multiplayer and cooperative mode. Exploring these dungeons, you will feel accompanied at all times and will be able to witness the traces of other adventurers.

name: Blackout: Uma Aventura Energética
description:
In Blackout, you have to help energy beings, Bivolt and Risoluminosa, who are in trouble. They have noticed a threatening drop in the level of positive energy on Planet Earth, one of the driving forces of the realm of energetic beings who live in symbiosis with the realm of material beings and who, if they become unbalanced, will suffer the negative effects through excesses or shortages of energy in our world.

When they ask for your help, they will tell you that, many years ago in our human time, they installed "positive energy" channels in various monuments throughout Planet Earth.
Surprisingly, when they came to inspect their positive energy sources, they realized that they were deteriorating much faster than expected. They were being covered by a layer of negative energy, unbalancing their realm and threatening our existence.

Join Bivolt and Risoluminosa and discover what's going wrong with the world's monuments.

name: Ambitious Mission
description: Sin descripción

name: Delirium
description: A psychological game about hardships of depression, life, being stuck, enraged and unable to fight. Unable to find the reason to continue and touches the dark side: The rage, hate, denial and definitely the wish for it to stop and for you to give up... But that's the easy way that leads nowhere...

name: Cazzarion: Ghost Frenzy
description: Collect Gems in a mine but avoid the ghosts and the bombs!

name: Traulian: O Ultimo General
description: Traulian: O Ultimo General is a medieval adventure game where you take the role of Traulian, the only survivor of the Dolbian army, in the great battle against the evil forces of Cerem. Your objective is to eliminate the monsters to avenge the death of your friends.

name: Cazzarion: Space Ace
description: Face off against swarms of enemies, as you try to avoid them while collecting power ups and weapons.

name: Cazzarion: Space Shooter
description:
If you like space shooter and space invader games, you should try this version of a galaxy shoot 'em up.
Galactic war in space and endless waves of alien spaceships are waiting for you!

name: Tantei Kibukawa Ryousuke Jiken-tan: Vol. 3 - Shisha no Rakuen
description:
Murders occur one after another in the paradise of an amusement park

The mystery deepens...

A creepy threatening letter...

You must solve the case with your own hands!

Several months have passed since the nightmare at Kairoukan.

Ikuo, who is struggling for ideas, visits his friend, Kikugawa.

At the office for the first time in a while, a beautiful secretary from the popular amusement park "Shangri-La" who calls herself "Kikukawa Haruna" comes to consult with them.

The request she makes is to provide security and investigate the cult-like threatening letter sent to the amusement park and the creepy prank that is similar to it.

However, the company president, Kimijima Hiroshi, wants the matter to be handled confidentially and without telling the police.

Not knowing the details and feeling suspicious, Ikuo and Izuna decide to head to Shangri-La.

However, contrary to Ikuo and the others' expectations, the mysterious person's crimes continue.

The blackmailer's unexpected plan closes in on Ikuo!

An invitation from paradise brought by a beautiful secretary.... And so begins a feast called judgment....
Who is the mysterious blackmailer?!

This is a "command selection" adventure game in which you read the text from the perspective of Ikuo, choose the actions you deem appropriate, and lead the case to a resolution.

name: Watermelon Game: Fruits Puzzle
description:
Experience the thrill of stacking and merging fruits in this deceptively simple yet captivating gameplay. Drop various fruits into the box and watch as the physics come alive, making them roll, shift, and merge upon contact.
Create mesmerizing chain reactions by merging identical fruits, building up to the ultimate Watermelon – not only a points bonanza but also a container-consuming giant.

name: AI2U: With You ‘Till The End
description: A first-person escape room game with AI-powered NPCS who are desperate to keep you by their side... so much so that they will resort to drastic measures to keep you from leaving! Explore the environment, solve puzzles, and uncover mysteries in different levels with various themes.

name: Pocket Zaurus: Party Island no Nakama-tachi 1
description: Sin descripción
